targets.rawSql: SELECT cost, end_time FROM octopus.electricity WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2023-11-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-11-30 00:00:00.000'
SELECT cost, end_time FROM octopus.electricity WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2023-10-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-10-31 00:00:00.000'
SELECT end_time FROM octopus.electricity WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2023-11-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-11-30 00:00:00.000' LIMIT 50
SELECT car_charge_cost, start_time, bump_charge_cost FROM octopus.electricity
SELECT car_charge_cost, start_time, bump_charge_cost FROM octopus.electricity WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2023-11-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-11-30 00:00:00.000'
SELECT cost, end_time FROM octopus.gas WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2023-10-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-10-31 00:00:00.000'
SELECT cost, end_time FROM octopus.gas WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2023-11-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-11-30 00:00:00.000'
SELECT cost, start_time FROM octopus.electricity WHERE end_time BETWEEN '2023-10-01 00:00:00.000' AND '2023-10-31 00:00:00.000'
SELECT kwh, end_time, threshold, current_price FROM octopus.electricity
